title: Knight
desc:
Post 571
- Gain a Follower
- Follower:
Anther player is added to the rotation right before you. This player is played by the Host.
The host must play in a way that benefits you in the best way possible. You may communicate with the host as to how you want the follower to play.
You may not see the Followerâ€™s cards, but the Follower knows all your cards.
If the follower somehow wins, Nobody wins, and the win is attributed to the follower in any statistic.
The follower starts with 7 cards in hand.
